sense.def: Pathological Condition Abbreviated Designation of shi ming 失明 , loss of vision. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 194: 兩目大眥二穴，只可背 睛斜飛，不得直針，直即傷睛致瞎，不可治也 , “The two holes in the inner canthi of the two eyes can only receive a needling in a slanting approach aiming at the back of the eyeball. They must not receive a straight needling. A straight [needling] will harm the eyeball and lead to blindness that is incurable”.
